alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 11:03AM MST until January 13 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Kellogg, Mullan, Lookout Pass, Eastport, Fernwood, Ritzville, Sandpoint, Grand Coulee, Hayden, Fourth Of July Pass, Wilbur, Cheney, Spokane Valley, Creston, St. Maries, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Davenport, Clark Fork, Rockford, Dobson Pass, Wallace, Airway Heights, Odessa, Athol, Bonners Ferry, Osburn, Downtown Spokane, Pinehurst, Worley, Harrington, Coeur d`Alene, Post Falls, Fairfield, Coulee City, and Priest River. * WHEN...Until noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle
